body.name: TOZO PA2 Bluetooth Speaker with Dual Drivers & Dual Bass Diaphragms, Deep Bass Loud Stereo Sound, IPX8 Waterproof, 25H Playtime, Custom EQ App Portable Wireless Speaker for Home Outdoors Travel Black

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Recycled Claim Standard Blended products included in the program use materials made from at least 50% recycled content.

features: [Dual Drivers & Dual Bass Diaphragms] The TOZO PA2 Bluetooth speaker boasts two dynamic coil drivers for audio output, enabling not only independent left and right channel playback from a single speaker, but also the connection of two speakers for an immersive stereo sound experience and enhanced bass, With this innovative setup allows you to enjoy a whole new dimension of music.

[Multi-function Speaker for Various Situations] With IPX8 waterproof function, the PA2 speakers are resistant to gentle splashes of water or rain, providing strong protection against water damage. What's more, it supports direct calls via Bluetooth, voice conferencing, group chats, and access to default voice assistants like Siri for hands-free convenience in your intelligent life.

[25H Continuous Playtime] The TOZO PA2 speaker has a powerful 2000mAh battery capacity that allows it to play continuously for up to 25 hours on a single full charge. This long-lasting battery life ensures an immersive listening experience during long outdoor trips.

[Cord Buckle Design - Easy to Carry Around] The unique cord buckle design allows for effortless attachment to your backpack, making it ideal for travel, parties, outdoor activities, vacations, and even in-car use. If you desire to enjoy your music beyond the confines of your home, a portable Bluetooth speaker is an absolute must-have, Simply secure it to your backpack and embark on exciting adventures!

[16 EQ Modes Adjustments With TOZO APP] The TOZO APP offers seamless connectivity with the TOZO PA2 speaker and provides 16 EQ adjustment modes. This allows users to effortlessly switch between different music styles and indulge in an unparalleled musical experience whenever they please.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enjoy Your Favorite Melodies Together Experience the power of sound and the magic of melodies with TOZO PA2 and share your favorite tunes and treasured moments with your loved ones.

Previous page Metal Wire Drawing Technology Stylish metal logo with a fine sand texture and high-gloss finish, presenting a refined appearance. Soft Rubber Speaker ends in soft rubber ensure stability, protection, and enjoyment in any position. Immerse Yourself in the Bass Dual passive radiators immerse you in the bass, making it a sensation you can hear and feel. Next page 1 Unique Craftsmanship 2 Comprehensive Protection 3 Powerful Bass
IPX8 Waterproof TOZO PA2 can endure many weather conditions and survive in 1 meter of water, ensuring it stays protected.

Incredible Audio Experience Dual full-range drivers combined with dual external passive radiators deliver a captivating auditory adventure. Sleek and Portable Compact and easily portable, it fits seamlessly into your lifestyle, just like a water bottle on your bike. Elevate Your Gatherings Elevate every gathering with TOZO PA2, delivering epic beats wherever the party takes you. Get ready to groove on and make every gathering a memorable party. Hand-free Bluetooth Calling The high-quality built-in microphone accurately captures your voice, ensuring crystal-clear call quality. From impromptu conference calls to casual catch-ups, you can seamlessly communicate anywhere.
Listen as You Wish Enjoy the freedom to place your speaker however and wherever you desire, be it horizontally or vertically, indoors or outdoors!
Stay with Music Everywhere Attach the speaker to your backpack using the lanyard loop, ensuring that immersive sound is always within arm's reach.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars **Big Sound, Big Battery, Big Value: The TOZO PA2 Packs a Punch**
reviews.reviewText: The TOZO PA2 Bluetooth speaker is a budget-friendly powerhouse that delivers surprisingly big sound in a compact package. Whether you're looking for a speaker for backyard BBQs, poolside lounging, or impromptu dance parties, the PA2 is a great option.* **Sound quality:** For its size, the PA2 puts out impressive sound. The dual drivers and dual bass diaphragms deliver rich, clear audio with booming bass that you can feel.* **Battery life:** The 2000mAh battery boasts a whopping 25 hours of playtime on a single charge, so you can party all day and night without worry.* **Durability:** The IPX8 waterproof rating means you can take the PA2 to the beach, pool, or even shower without fear of damage.* **Portability:** The compact and lightweight design makes the PA2 perfect for taking on the go.* **Connectivity:** Bluetooth 5.0 ensures a stable connection and impressive range.* **There's no built-in microphone, so you can't use it for hands-free calls.****Overall, the TOZO PA2 is a fantastic value for the price. It's a great choice for anyone who wants a portable, durable, and great-sounding Bluetooth speaker.****Here are some additional things you might find helpful:*** The PA2 comes in a variety of colors, so you can choose one that matches your style.* There's a companion app that you can use to customize the EQ settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this speaker
reviews.reviewText: I did not really think I would get much out of a Bluetooth speaker compared to the sound quality of my iPad but I was very wrong.Build quality: very strong plastic, seems there may be some sort of cloth stitched over the small metal holes where the sound comes out of which I really think adds to the high quality feel and also just makes this speaker one that you want to use that much more. I don’t know formal terms but New feature on this year’s model is the vibrating bumpers on either end of the speaker that vibrate with increased bass sound. I really like this feature as it adds to the depth of the bass and just has a premium feel.User friendliness: this speaker stands up on its own with good stability on either end or can be placed on its side horizontally. No issues with it being in a certain position causing a problem or anything like that. Love that as soon as you turn the speaker on, it will auto connect to the last device that was connected. Have had a great time watching movies with this speaker on my iPad in bed.Battery life: charged this after 2 full movies, did not die on me though. Long battery life and charging cable included has the usb-c end that will plug into my phone’s outlet charger so I can use the same plug as my iphone.This is a great product and definitely worth the money, especially if you get the option for coupon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Full bodied bass for such a compact size
reviews.reviewText: The Tozo PA2 Bluetooth Speaker packs an impressive audio punch for its compact size. Connecting to devices like smartphones and tablets via Bluetooth was a breeze. I simply turned on the speaker and put it in pairing mode, then connected via the Bluetooth settings on my phone.Once connected, the PA2 delivers a surprisingly bold sound. The bass output is full-bodied for such a petite speaker. Many mini Bluetooth speakers I've used sound weak on the low end, but the PA2 has some thump to it even at higher volumes. I wouldn't call the bass boomy or overpowering; rather, it gives music a warm fullness you likely wouldn't expect from the speaker's palm-sized dimensions.Midrange tones come through clearly, allowing vocals to cut through a mix cleanly. Highs are crisp without sounding harsh or sibilant. Overall, the sound profile is pleasingly balanced.In terms of design, the PA2's small, circular shape makes it very portable. It takes up very little room in my luggage. I haven't put this to the test yet, but it has an IPX8 waterproof rating, which means I won't worry about using it at the pool or beach. Battery life is impressive too.Overall, between the great sound, rugged build, and affordable price, the Tozo PA2 Bluetooth Speaker is easy for me to recommend for those seeking big sound in a highly travel-friendly form factor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The sound quality is impressive!
reviews.reviewText: I received this wireless speaker and couldn't be more pleased with its performance. The sound quality is impressive, with clear tones that enhance the overall listening experience. Additionally, its long-lasting battery life has proven to be a standout feature, without the hassle of frequent charging. The setup process was a breeze, adding to the user-friendly nature of this device.The Tozo speaker quality is excellent and compares to what you might expect from higher-priced brands, making it an exceptional value. A noteworthy feature is the ability to fine-tune sound settings through the accompanying app, offering a personalized audio experience. Its thoughtful features, durable build, and hassle-free connectivity make it a standout choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sound with an excellent price
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for an speaker to use inside and outside and I found this to be the perfect match for me.The size is perfect, lightweight for carry on it, the sound is clear and has water protection!! Also, the battery live is perfect.The overall quality is it if doubt, I have several Tozo products that works great after several years.Also, with the app, you can equalize the sound to your preferences.In summary, great great speaker to carry on with you all time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Decent little Bluetooth speaker from reputable brand Tozo. I
reviews.reviewText: Tozo PA2 reviewThis is the second speaker I’ve bought from the growing array of audio equipment from Tozo, and it’s definitely a step up from their cheaper model the PA1, and justifies the higher price point.Out the box it has a much sleeker form factor than the PA1. It’s more rounded and fits nicer in the hand, and feels less bulky. It covered in a mesh type fabric but is tightly formed around the curves so feels nice and solid. Either end there is a 1” bass woofer protected by a rubber stand. The buttons on the back are all rubberised (I guess to make it compliant with submersion in water). It does feel a bit strange in how to place it in a table as it sits well upright with the rubber feet, but on its side it does tend to rock a little. I’m not sure this affects the sound though.Setup is so easy out the box, it pairs within seconds once setup and connects every time without fail. This is very different to the Sonos move I got over Christmas. Just hold the pair button to search, pair from your phone and you’re done.As per usual there are the usual play pause, power and volume buttons that double as skip and rewind. (And if you’re using it for a phone call have other options to answer and drop etc). It’s also got an EQ button for switching between bass boost, treble boost and normal. There are more EQ options via the free app which give you even more customisation of the sound suitable for the environment you’re in.It’s powered by the included USB-C which is the norm for anything these days. Power life seems pretty good so far although haven’t fully tested the run time to see if similar to the claimed 25 hours playback. But with this it should be more than enough for a camping weekend away.Sound wise it definitely steps up from the cheaper PA1. It doesn’t have any distortion through the range of except it looses a bit of punch at top volumes with more bass.Otherwise the mids and trebles perform very well for a portable speaker. As with any non-stereo speaker direction can have a big influence on sound and no surprises with this one that when a bass port is facing you you definitely get more warmth from the sound compared to face on, but perhaps this is why it’s better having it stood up.You can also pair two of these to make a stereo pair, but I haven’t tried this, and it didn’t work to add my older PA1 speaker.Overall a very competent little speaker with improved sound quality and battery life in a solid form. Perfect for days out/ travelling /camping and the beech. Roll on summer!
A great speaker especially considering the price. When paired with the Tozo app you have unlimited sound profiles.
Super enceinte portable, le son est de très bonne qualité, le durée de charge de la batterie, dure très longtemps, jumelage avec le téléphone est très facile, je recommande ce produits
